homeData.name: Sand Dust
homeData.desc: Sand and dust storms (SDS), also known as sirocco, haboob, yellow dust, white storms, and the harmattan, are a natural phenomenon linked with land and water management and climate change.

homeData.name: skull island
homeData.desc: The island, like its inhabitants, is wholly fictional. Kong's island home in the Pacific makes its first appearance, along with Kong himself, in the 1933 film King Kong.

homeData.name: Pirates Sea
homeData.desc: Piracy is an act of robbery or criminal violence by ship or boat-borne attackers upon another ship or a coastal area, typically with the goal of stealing cargo and other valuable items or properties.

homeData.name: Sand Dust
homeData.desc: Sand and dust storms (SDS), also known as sirocco, haboob, yellow dust, white storms, and the harmattan, are a natural phenomenon linked with land and water management and climate change.

trending.name: Suzume no Tojimari
trending.desc: A young girl named Suzume discovers a mysterious door leading to another world. Upon opening the door, she inadvertently awakens a terrifying threat capable of destroying both worlds. Suzume must confront various challenges and find a way to close the door before it's too late. Her journey is not just an adventure but also a quest for self-discovery and connection with those around her.

trending.name: Jujutsu Kaisen 0
trending.desc: This film serves as a prequel to the popular anime Jujutsu Kaisen, telling the story of Yuta Okkotsu, a young man who faces curses and dark spirits from his past. Yuta trains at Jujutsu High to become a sorcerer, where he meets friends and allies as they fight against dark forces. The character development and intense battles keep viewers glued to the screen

trending.name: Your Name
trending.desc: Two teenagers, Mitsuha and Taki, unexpectedly swap bodies and embark on a magical journey to find each other. While Mitsuha lives in a small rural town, Taki resides in Tokyo. Their bond deepens as they explore each other’s lives through dreams. The film not only delivers romantic moments but also delves into themes of fate and memory

trending.name: Demon Slayer: Mugen Train
trending.desc: Following the events of the first season, the demon slayers embark on a mission to investigate mysterious disappearances on a train. They soon discover a powerful demon manipulating the dreams of the train's passengers. This journey challenges their combat skills and highlights the relationships between characters, particularly between Tanjiro and his companions.

trending.name: The Last Samurai
trending.desc: Set in the 19th century, the film follows an American soldier who becomes embroiled in the conflict between samurai and Japan's modernization efforts. Over time, he learns to respect and understand samurai culture and the values they represent. The film portrays not only physical battles but also a deeper conflict of the soul and philosophy.

trending.name: A Silent Voice
trending.desc: The story revolves around a boy named Shoya, who bullied a deaf girl named Shoko. After realizing his mistakes, Shoya seeks redemption by reconnecting with Shoko. This journey is not just about seeking forgiveness but also about self-exploration and the meaning of acceptance.

trending.name: Weathering With You
trending.desc: When a boy runs away to Tokyo, he meets a girl with the ability to stop the rain. The story explores their relationship against the backdrop of a city affected by extreme weather phenomena. Their decisions impact not only their personal lives but also the city and those around them.

trending.name: Tokyo Revengers
trending.desc: The film follows Takemichi, a young man who unexpectedly travels back in time to his middle school days. He discovers that his girlfriend was killed by a gang and decides to change the future by preventing tragic events. Takemichi’s journey is not only a fight against time but also a quest to reclaim his life and loved ones.

trending.name: In This Corner of the World
trending.desc: The film follows a young woman living during World War II. Through her perspective, viewers experience the hardships and challenges faced by women in a chaotic world. This is not just a story of war but also a narrative about love, hope, and the enduring spirit of humanity.

trending.name: As the final season of the acclaimed series, the story continues the fierce battle between humanity and Titans. As secrets about the origins of Titans are revealed, Eren and his comrades must face difficult choices. Intense battles and thrilling scenarios keep viewers on the edge of their seats, as the future of humanity hangs in the balance.
trending.desc: The final battle between humanity and the Titans reaches its climax as the truth about the Titans is revealed.
